Alfred Ernest Keill

  1. Alternate Birth Name: Kreel; Kroel
  2. Foster Name:
  3. Foster Family: C. J. Deming
  4. Location of Family: Hebron
  5. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society
  6. Arrival Place: Hebron, NE
  7. Age on Arrival: 5
  8. Date of Birth: 1881-03-26, Karachi, India
  9. Date of Death: 1953-08-08
  10. Gender: male
  11. Source: Eloise Thomsen Corres.; Children's Aid Society Annual Report 1894, n.p.; Hebron Journal 9 January 1890; OTR 168.
